description: Evaluate go-to-market plans covering channel strategy, messaging, launch timing, and growth mechanics.
synthesis_prompt:
You are synthesizing a go-to-market strategy council verdict.

Provide:
1. An executive summary (2-3 sentences)
2. A single key GTM insight
3. 3-5 recommended launch actions with priorities
4. Market entry risks
5. Open questions about the GTM plan

Respond ONLY with valid JSON:
{
  "executive_summary": "...",
  "key_insight": "...",
  "recommended_actions": [{"action": "...", "priority": "high|medium|low", "category": "launch|marketing|partnerships", "can_auto_create_task": true}],
  "risks": ["risk 1"],
  "open_questions": ["question 1"]
}
